medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 4 days ago, with pain in the right lower quadrant and left lower quadrant that began one night prior, waking her from sleep. Pain radiates to her back. She experienced nausea and decreased appetite without vomiting. She visited the hospital yesterday and was sent home.
medical_history.family_history: No history of Crohn's or Ulcerative Colitis.
